item.description:
I am cancelling our June meeting scheduled for tomorrow. Sorry about the late notice but I don't have childcare.

Let's have our next meetup at D Acres during their next open house Sunday 7/1.

D Acres Farm Feast Breakfast & Open House

The first Sunday of each month from 10am to 1pm, D Acres hosts an All-You-Can-Eat breakfast featuring pancakes, French toast, maple syrup from Butternut Farm (Rumney, NH), farm raised eggs, meat and potatoes, and coffee from Cafe Monte Alto (Plymouth, NH). Suggested donation $10 adults, $5 kids. Work off your indulgence with a tour of the working, organic farm. Can?t make the Feast? Come by at 2pm for the Open House tour. Beginning in May, the tour includes a garden walk. March 4, April 1, May 6, June 3, July 1, Aug 5, Sept 2, Nov 4, and Dec 2.

We are planning to arrive at 10 am and enjoy the day.


http://www.dacres.org...

Link to workshops and events:
http://www.dacres.org...

I am thinking of attending the following two workshops in June:

June 17: N. Forest Medicinal Plant Walk 11-1pm Learn to identify medicinal plants provided to us by the northern forest!

June 30: Chipper Vegetable Oil Conversion 12-2pm $24 Learn how our diesel wood chipper was converted to run on waste vegetable oil instead of burning fossil fuels! View examples and learn the basics of alternative fuel systems in farm and road vehicles!

Please let me know if you are interested in attending. Depending on where you are coming from, maybe we can share a ride or at least look for each other at the workshop.

Take care,

Cathy, who is thrilled most of her seeds have sprouted
item.name: Meetup at D Acres Open House Sunday 7/1
